name: Isle Survive
description:
Stranded in a desolate land with just an axe as your friend, chop down trees, craft your first pickaxe, mine for stone and precious ores then build the castle of your dreams. All this is possible in the first version of Isle Survive.

Isle Survive is a game about crafting, mining and building. Randomly generated worlds can be moulded into any shape or form, as long as it is blocky!
